# Gbits
Arduino library for viewing numbers on bit level

##
Serial monitor output from example bits32.ino
```
Starting bits...
 33222222 22221111 111111           
 10987654 32109876 54321098 76543210
 -------- -------- -------- --------
 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111   |   4294967295
 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000   |   0
 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000001   |   1
 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000010   |   2
 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000011   |   3
 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000100   |   4
 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000101   |   5
 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000110   |   6
 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000111   |   7
 00000000 00000000 00000000 00001000   |   8
 00000000 00000000 00000000 00001001   |   9
 00000000 00000000 00000000 00001010   |   10
 00000000 00000000 00000000 00001011   |   11
 00000000 00000000 00000000 00001100   |   12
 00000000 00000000 00000000 00001101   |   13
 00000000 00000000 00000000 00001110   |   14
 00000000 00000000 00000000 00001111   |   15
 00000000 00000000 00000000 00010000   |   16
 00000000 00000000 00000000 00010001   |   17
 00000000 00000000 00000000 00010010   |   18

```
